sources.title: Evil Eyes | Full Horror Movie
sources.description:
**This film is under license from The Asylum.  All rights reserved**

Evil Eyes - A screenwriter is plagued by nightmares as he writes a script about a family that was slaughtered years before. Soon, the grisly murders he's writing about starts to actually happen.

2004
Stars: Adam Baldwin, Jennifer Gates, Udo Kier

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies. 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGBzBkV-MinlBvHBzZawfLQ/playlists

#FullFreeMovies #MovieCentral #FreeYouTubeMovies

metadata.Plot: The successful screenplay writer Jeff Stenn (Adam Baldwin) is in disgrace with the big studios and needs money to pay his mortgage. He is happily married to his wife Tree (Jennifer Gates) and they are trying to have a baby, but he is afraid that his financial situation affects his marriage. Out of the blue, the weird producer George (Udo Kier) offers the true story of a real homicide that happened thirty-five years ago to Jeff to write the screenplay. He accepts the offer and learns that the killer killed his pregnant wife and in-laws and committed suicide after. While writing the screenplay, Jeff sees many friends and acquaintances dying and questions whether his writing is causing the deaths.
metadata.Actors: Adam Baldwin, Jennifer Gates, Udo Kier
